urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, check the 5-day forecast or use flood maps

tweets.text:
⚠️💧FLOODING LATEST💧⚠️

We’re pumping out water & fixing track issues causing disruption:
⚠️#NewtonleWillows - #Eccles
⚠️#Stockport - #Altrincham
⚠️#Carnforth - #Settle
⚠️near #Trentham #StokeonTrent 

We’re really sorry to anyone impacted 😞

📲Pls check https://t.co/3s7AA8fygv https://t.co/weH823dwN6

We currently have 9 flood warnings in place for #Essex and #Suffolk⚠️

Find out where here: https://t.co/YIjsFwpg8o

Sign up to our flood warning service here: https://t.co/P6B5248RRV #Flood #Safety https://t.co/eUSJHKf8O3
@JoWilliamsUK @EnvAgencyNW Hi Jo. The Crossens catchment that much of Southport / W Lancs is pumped as much of it is below sea level. Hope that helps?

Want to find out more about property flood resilience measures and how they work? Take a look at this short animation: https://t.co/G66GhFkAj6 @JBAConsulting @LivingWithH2O @YorkshireiCASP @EnvAgency @YorkshireWater @northyorkscc @Calderdale  @East_Riding @SheffCouncil https://t.co/38aWRR0h0I
We’ve got a few flood alerts and flood warnings out across the South East. You can check your area at https://t.co/64gyL62UXF #PrepareActSurvive

The best way to protect #biodiversity remains to support & expand a protected area network that is:

🐟Ecologically representative
🌲Effectively managed
🌐Better connected to plan for #ClimateChange & species migration

—Anne Larigauderie of @IPBES at @Europarl_EN hearing https://t.co/xm568kQ2Eb

tweets.text:
#MytholmroydFAS - We're reinforcing the river bank  between White Houses & Hawksclough to provide extra protection against scour in high river flows.

To do this safely we need to close one lane on Burnley Road during working hours next week. 
#flooding 

https://t.co/HgdBp7TncO https://t.co/zPCza70bYH

urls.title: Eye On Calderdale
urls.description: Your one stop website for up to date information about flooding, weather and traffic disruptions across the Borough of Calderdale.

tweets.text: @AndynBrown16 @EnvAgencyNW Can you explain what they do? The tide is fairly low now, so why do you have to pump rather than just letting it flow out? Or is this getting the drainage channels to lower levels than the river?

Flood alert: River Lea burst its banks at Wardown Park Lake, Moor Park and reports of surface water flooding at Wandon Park and Hatters Way. 
⚠️ Please be vigilant. Avoid walking, cycling or driving through flood water.  Floodline 0845 988 1188.  @envagencyse, #floodaware.

Our ocean is getting warmer, and our rivers are getting drier.

We work to protect them against the effects of climate change and to support the survival of many species, like Atlantic salmon.

Read about our plan to address the #ClimateEmergency: https://t.co/s1QHtznLdu

#EA2025 https://t.co/afe7Bwh7RE

tweets.text:
The @EnvAgency have issued a number of flood alerts and flood warnings across #Essex following heavy overnight rain. ⚠️🌧️

For more information > https://t.co/5aGS4ARP08 https://t.co/CjmA7P1O7u

Thankfully rain has eased this afternoon. But as sign of how much there has been we have ALL the pumps running at @EnvAgencyNW #Crossens Pumping Station. This is a lot of water being shifted! #floodaware

Ace to see evidence of the leaky dams we designed & built nr Staveley for @SCRiversTrust @EnvAgencyNW working in the recent storms. In the close-up you can see dead rushes that have been washed down the watercourse, wedged in between the top 2 courses of logs. #nfm #slowtheflow https://t.co/WFPGXAvv8o

Chief exec of @EnvAgency: "we welcome the Prime Minister's invitation to business leaders to identify which rules and regulations they would like to see gone now Brexit has happened." https://t.co/meuaHTcWeq

Reassuring.

Flood warnings are now in force for the River Weaver at Acton Bridge & Weaverham #Cheshire & the River Bollin & Agden Brook at Little Bollington in #GrManchester

#PrepareActSurvive: keep up to date with the current situation & sign up to flood warnings https://t.co/CMfTIXUuR8 https://t.co/XzbHdDrW1E

urls.title: Sign up for flood warnings
urls.description: Register your home or business in England, Scotland or Wales to receive flood warnings and find out how to check flood risk in Northern Ireland

tweets.text: With recent persistent 🌧 we’ve issued @EnvAgencyNW #flood alerts for parts of a #Lancashire #Merseyside. Flooding of low lying land / roads possible. Detail at https://t.co/vKsRlvVySm #floodaware https://t.co/bjPy6mkPFl

Our teams are out across the borough making gullies & drains clear in this wet weather.
They're also working with @EnvAgency to monitor levels for River Ingrebourne, where we have a flood warning & River Rom
Report any concerns  01708 434605 or visit https://t.co/yCmk9zDPq8 https://t.co/BN0tkmsjhb

tweets.text:
Trees, hedgerows, fencing and sediment traps have been introduced to farms in the Esk Catchment as part of the Water Environment Grant (WEG) Esk Restoration Project. 

We will continue to work with @northyorkmoors, to deliver the project in spring 2021. 

#northyorkshire https://t.co/JFPLxwjJwK
The River Ryton right through #Worksop is subject to a flood alert from @EnvAgency - they say flooding of properties isn’t forecast at this stage.

flood defences appear to be holding water in Dulwich Park, as these drenchers look like to become the 'new normal' for our winters @lb_southwark @DulwichPark @EnvAgencySE @thameswater @ClimateLondon @WildLondon https://t.co/UF9J5FBeDT

It’s a wet day across the #Midlands and there are a number of #flood alerts and warnings across the region.

Check your flood risk and do not attempt to drive through flood water, as just 30cm is enough to move your car.

https://t.co/4HSc5MbL20 https://t.co/2b92j3pAdZ

Parts of #Cambridgeshire, particularly #Huntingdonshire, have flooded🌊

If a road has been closed, DON'T ignore the signs ❌⛔️

Prepare your property for continued rainfall 🌧️. To report a flooded area, visit the @CambsCC website ➡️ https://t.co/1DdybXgKVa

(1/2) https://t.co/qH0tc3HzRj
@HertsmereBC @EnvAgency Thanks. This is a photo just taken. Has subsided a bit thankfully, but still dangerously close to bursting again. https://t.co/TYp0qvO6e5

According to @guardian "Disposal of radioactive waste is one of six issues to be addressed before plant in Essex can go ahead" but no details given on @EnvAgency report. Anyone know more on this? "https://t.co/eILbAN6MdE
@LisaLevs Hi Lisa, Thanks for your message. The flood defence is operated by @EnvAgency so hopefully they can this.
@clare_molyneaux @EnvAgencySE @letstalkcentral This area is supposed to flood before the gardens https://t.co/eLLwzBpBHO

🛑Currently have Flood Warning on river Stour.
Caution 👉Flood Alert on following rivers: Brain, Pant, Colne & Blackwater. #Essex @EnvAgency @NFUEastAnglia @CLAEast @essexhighways @EALCnews @RCCEssex @RSNonline @EP_RURAL https://t.co/Ns7Ex1j9vH
On 14/01/21 at 06:30 the river level was 0.39m. https://t.co/54bKYDoY7B

Due to heavy rain we have started to deploy Phase 1 of the #Northwich Scheme & will be erecting temporary defences at Barons Quay. This is being done as a precaution to protect the community from potential high river levels

Check your #flood risk 👉https://t.co/DelUfH7Qeq https://t.co/uS1SaUlRhF
Flood alerts issued across Melton Borough @EnvAgencyMids @aliciakearns https://t.co/x8gZKp83hJ

Thank you to @WEETFEvents for inviting me to speak this morning, and to the delegates for the inspired discussion.

The future for environmental regulation: Green growth not red tape... my full speech here: https://t.co/ExHgNoKaF2

#Regulation #GreenGrowth #ClimateEmergency https://t.co/zfMztL5qmG
